name: Planet Doctor/星球医生
description:
A small project made for global game jam 2023 with the theme "root".

Story background How to play

By clicking the arrows to rotate the little square planet and control the movement of several different blocks. The goal is to fill in all the empty holes. Click on the doctor to restart the current level.

Free fall, can be changed into rooting block Fixed, can change the surrounding normal block into rooting block Free fall, can be changed into rooted block Fixed, barrier Free fall, can change the rooting/rooted block back to normal blockFixed, need to be filled
Credits

Director: 黄花鱼

Art: 潮平儿, Hieumay, ichol

Programm: 秃头小周，神秘外援

Sound:绿豆糕
